summary:
*Requires DragonBorn*
Adds Poison Rune, Frenzy Rune and Ash Rune Scrolls.
You can also craft them at the Atronach Forge.
descriptionHtml:
Recipes for the Forge:
Poison Rune:
Paper Roll
Charcoal
Firewood
Night shade

Frenzy Rune:
Paper Roll
Charcoal
Firewood
Fly Amanita

Ash Rune:
Paper Roll
Charcoal
Firewood
Ash Creep Cluster



Maybe add more scrolls
author: onerune
